product_name: Deuter Kid Comfort Sun Roof and Rain Cover - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Flexible and quick-mounting, the Deuter Kid Comfort Sun Roof and Rain Cover protects your child from sun or rain when attached to the Kid Comfort Air or Kid Comfort II (sold separately). Ripstop nylon fabric is durable and features great UV protection. Clear plastic rain shield on each side can be folded up when only sun protection is needed. Flexible Deuter Kid Comfort Sun Roof and Rain Cover stores easily inside the Kid Comfort lower pockets or in the hydration pocket.
short_description: Flexible and quick-mounting, the Deuter Kid Comfort Sun Roof and Rain Cover protects your child from sun or rain when attached to the Kid Comfort Air or Kid Comfort II (sold separately).
